content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For access to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" project-specific\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"role-based\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" systems and repositories (e.g., Teams channel, Azure DevOps board, reference materials, proposals, SoW), or for any other project-related questions, please feel free to reach out to directly your project manager. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6797,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5868229d-65b4-4a3c-8ffd-5761aa52b228/questions.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5868229d-65b4-4a3c-8ffd-5761aa52b228/questions.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"questions.PNG\",\"name\":\"questions.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5868229d-65b4-4a3c-8ffd-5761aa52b228\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":312,\"height\":367},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
